title: Warden Poppy
body:
Hey, this is my first post here, I did a concept of Poppy with a Warden skin. I think they did a fantastic job with them (and the marauder ones as well), and I think Poppy would be a cool addition if they were to expand on them. I also thought she needed some visual love, since she hasn't been updated since forever. 

I hope you guys like it, I'd like to do more League art.

http://i.imgur.com/nlpIGTW.jpg

> [{quoted}](name=Xenohaz,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=lR0e5lZj,comment-id=000b00000000000400000000,timestamp=2015-03-07T19:48:42.202+0000)
>
> Actually, I just realized it might be a Lawful Evil/Chaotic Evil thing.  One side is destroying entire villages for the sake of the law (seems pretty evil to me, just hiding behind the law to justify it) and the other just does it for fun.

Mmm, simply destroying a village is not evil for it's own sake; the difference comes in whether they destroyed the village because it furthered their goals, vs destroying the village because they felt they had to. It's a subtle difference, but that difference is what separates the lawful neutrals vs the lawful evils.

Basically, if they're hiding behind the law to justify their thing, yes they're evil. If they're doing it because it's required by the law (or the village has broken the law) then it's neutral.
